code_value: Questions 1~2  Your deskmate has been absent from class for two days. So you call him and ask him two questions to show your concern.</br>Questions 3~4  Your cousin is going to graduate from university. You ask him two questions about his plan.
Questions 1~2  Your deskmate has been absent from class for two days. So you call him and ask him two questions to show your concern.
Questions 3~4  Your cousin is going to graduate from university. You ask him two questions about his plan.
